name: Sentenced (itch)
description: This is a short platformer that I made for "My First Game Jam Winter 2021". I hope it is enjoyable. I was able to learn a lot by putting this together. Feedback is absolutely appreciated. I have uploaded a web version, Windows executable, and a Linux executable. You can use either keyboard or a controller. Many of the jumps require dashing. It's E on the keyboard and X on an Xbox gamepad. There is an instruction/controls screen. Gamepad is recommended.
